articles.title: Heads up, burger fans: You can now get your Five Guys hamburger at Pavilion KL for RM2 cheaper than at Genting Highlands outlet - Malay Mail
articles.description: KUALA LUMPUR, April 11 — Today marks the opening of the second Malaysian outlet for American burger joint Five Guys at the Connection Level 3, Pavilion Kuala Lumpur. What’s on every burger fan’s mind is whether the menu prices are cheaper compared to their Ge…
